name: Slider Input Element
author: Arron Schaar
description: An enchanced version of the HTML5 range input.

attributes.data-name: The name of the input form element
attributes.data-min: Minimum start value of the range slider
attributes.data-max: Maximum start value of the range slider
attributes.data-step: How much to increment on each step
attributes.data-snap: Force the slider to snap to defined values(boolean attribute)

events.change: Fired each time the input value changes

setters.label: Sets the slider label
setters.min: Sets the minimum value of the slider
setters.max: Sets the maximum value of the slider
